name: C.B.T
description:
Do you wanna be a baller?
C.B.T (Crazy Ball Time) is a ball-rolling platformer, with crazy tough action, and even crazier Balls.

60 stages of straight BALLIN


Traverse 6 unique worlds, steadily introducing new hazards and obstacles.

Crazy Speed


With infinite lives, but finite time, beating worlds will take both speed and precision. Every shaved second counts, and using physics to find creative shortcuts will give you the upper hand.

Select ya balls


Unlock several ballers to choose from by clearing worlds in record time.
